entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Sainte-Agathe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:25 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
